oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - James Slater - 2018-08-25
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by James Slater and friends from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on August 25, 2018. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: James Slater;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (01:45) Opening comments and introduction by Kayleigh Shoemaker / (04:41) Opening comments from James / (05:15) Introduces the next song / (05:40) Performs Thank You Mr. Grieves / (08:31) Talks about the previous song / (08:49) Introduces the next song / (09:20) Performs Town Of Dreamers / (12:20) Introduces the next song / (12:55) Performs Mexicoma (excerpt) / (15:48) Introduces the next song / (16:28) Performs That's Why God Made Mexico (excerpt) / (17:31) Introduces the next song / (17:59) Performs Open Season On My Heart (excerpt) / (20:13) Talks about performance of the last song / (21:00) Introduces the next song / (21:23) Performs Damn Sure Do / (24:29) Introduces back up vocalists Ronnie Yates and Katie / (25:35) Performs (You Make Me Feel Like) A Natural Woman (Katie and Ronnie) / (26:48) Introduces the next song / (27:39) Performs Sing Like Aretha (Katie and Ronnie) / (33:55) James tells story about Leon Russell and introduces the next song / (33:55) Performs A Song For You (Ronnie Yates) / (35:24) Introduces the next song / (35:38) Performs The High Cost Of Living (James with Peter) / (39:45) Introduces the next song / (41:57) Performs In My Daughter's Eyes / (44:44) Introduces the next song / (46:03) Performs Ain't My Baby Grand / (49:13) Closing comments by James / (49:25) Walk-out music / (49:39) FILE END
